text: Strmilov () is a town in Jindřichův Hradec District in the South Bohemian Region of the Czech Republic. In 2020, 1,440 people lived there. == Twin towns – sister cities == Strmilov is twinned with: * Trubschachen, Switzerland == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in the Czech Republic Category:South Bohemian Region
title: Strmilov
